text:
NVIDIA | Front-End Web Developer | Full-Time | Reading, United Kingdom | ONSITE

NVIDIA are looking for an experienced and talented front-end web developer to join the European Digital Development team based in our Reading, UK office. The successful candidate will have the opportunity to be involved in a diverse range of projects that service millions of customers and businesses daily. The European team works across 30 websites in 14 languages, including many bespoke applications, tools, and systems.

http://jobsearch.nvidia.com/pljb/nvidia/nvidiaemployment/app...
